sentences: Vera Luttenberger (born January 28, 1993), better known as Charlee, is an Austrian electropop singer.
The first single, "Boy Like You", a song co-written by the American pop singer and songwriter Kesha, was released in August 2010.
Charlee participated in the Austrian selection for the Eurovision Song Contest 2011, where she sang the song "Good to Be Bad" (her second single) and finished in eighth place.
Later in 2011, she released her third single, "Obvious".
On 29 April 2011, Charlee released her debut album, This Is Me.
